hero.title: Wplace Pixel Tool
hero.subtitle: Ultimate Pixel Art Creator for Wplace
hero.description: Transform any image into perfect Wplace-ready pixel art with our advanced converter. Featuring official color palette matching, multiple scaling algorithms, and dithering options.

upload.title: Upload an image to start creating

tips.title: Quick Tips
tips.tip1: Try different block sizes for detail
tips.tip3: Nearest Neighbor scaling works best for crisp pixel art
tips.tip4: Tip: Try different block sizes and dithering for various effects

colorMatching.title: Perfect Color Matching
colorMatching.description: Our algorithm automatically maps your images to the official Wplace color palette for perfect compatibility.

algorithms.title: Advanced Algorithms
algorithms.description: Choose between Nearest Neighbor, Bilinear, or Lanczos scaling for different pixel art styles.

privacy.title: Privacy First
privacy.description: All processing happens in your browser. No uploads, no data collection, 100% private.

seo.intro: Wplace Pixel Tool is the premier solution for creating pixel art specifically optimized for Wplace. Whether you're a seasoned artist or a beginner, our tool makes it easy to convert any image into Wplace-compatible pixel art with just a few clicks.

forArtists.title: Perfect for Wplace Artists
forArtists.description: Our specialized converter ensures your creations match the exact color palette used in Wplace, eliminating the frustration of color mismatches when transferring your designs. The customizable pixel block size lets you create anything from detailed miniatures to large-scale pixel art masterpieces.

features.title: Professional-Grade Features
features.description: Wplace Pixel Tool offers advanced features typically found only in premium software:
list: Multiple scaling algorithms (Nearest Neighbor, Bilinear, Lanczos)
Floyd-Steinberg dithering for smoother color transitions
Custom palette support for creative experimentation

free.title: Free and Browser-Based
free.description: Unlike other pixel art tools, Wplace Pixel Tool is completely free to use and runs entirely in your browser. No downloads, no installations, and no sign-ups required. Start creating beautiful Wplace pixel art instantly on any device.

seo.cta: Ready to create amazing pixel art for Wplace? Upload your image and start pixelizing now!

about.title: About
about.description: About Wplace Pixel Tool: free, privacy-friendly pixel art converter for Wplace.
about.content1: Wplace Pixel Tool helps players convert images into Wplace-compatible pixel grids using the official palette. Everything runs in your browser: no uploads, no accounts, no cost.
about.content2: The project focuses on usability, performance, and faithful color mapping for consistent results on Wplace.
about.missionContent: We believe pixel art creation should be accessible to everyone, regardless of technical expertise or language. That's why we've built the first truly global pixel art tool with comprehensive multi-language support and privacy-first design.
about.feature2: Real-time preview with interactive comparison slider

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.description: Terms of Service for Wplace Pixel Tool.
terms.acceptanceContent: By using Wplace Pixel Tool, you agree to use the service at your own risk. The tool is provided "as is" without warranties.
terms.usageContent: You are responsible for ensuring that any generated content complies with Wplace guidelines and applicable laws.
terms.modificationsContent: We may update these terms from time to time. Continued use constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.
terms.limitationContent: Wplace Pixel Tool and its developers shall not be liable for any damages arising from the use of this service.
terms.privacyContent: All image processing occurs locally in your browser. We do not collect, store, or transmit your images or personal data.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.description: Privacy Policy for Wplace Pixel Tool.
privacy.commitmentContent: We are committed to protecting your privacy. Wplace Pixel Tool processes all images locally in your browser.
privacy.dataCollectionContent: We do not collect, store, or transmit any of your personal data or images to our servers. All processing happens entirely within your browser.
privacy.analyticsContent: This website may use basic analytics to understand usage patterns, but no personal information is collected.
privacy.cookiesContent: We may use essential cookies for basic site functionality. No tracking cookies are used.
privacy.contactContent: If you have any questions about this privacy policy, please contact us through our official channels.
